definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: A red carpet stretched across the cement floor, welcomingvisitors to a huge door that appeared to be forged of solid metal.
sentences.chinese: 水泥地上的红地毯一直延伸到一扇厚厚的金属大门前。

sentences.english: Bus routes and railways, both overground and underground, converged on the station.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车线路和地上地下路轨都在该站交汇。

sentences.english: The ground is covered with stiff, dry branches which have rotted off as the trees die.
sentences.chinese: 地上全是硬而干的树枝，都是因树死而凋落下来的。

sentences.english: Keefer screamed with pain and rolled on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 吉弗疼得尖声叫喊，在地上打滚。

sentences.english: The bird flew up from the grass.
The modern superficies systems stem from Roman Law.
sentences.chinese: 近现代地上权肇端于罗马法。

sentences.english: The tanks shall be firmly fixed onto the ground.
sentences.chinese: 该贮槽必须牢固建筑于地上。

sentences.english: The seed was sprayed over the ground in huge quantities by aeroplanes.
sentences.chinese: 飞机把这种草籽大量地撒播在地上。

sentences.english: Was sitting on the floor and cry?
He fell headlong and landed on his face.
sentences.chinese: 他脸朝下一头栽到地上。

sentences.english: Whoever invokes a blessing in the land will do so by the God of truth;
sentences.chinese: 这样，在地上为自己求福的，必凭真实的神求福。

sentences.english: Floor bridge. Lie on your back with legs bent and your feet flat on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 背部着地平躺，两腿弯曲，脚平放在地上。

sentences.english: When the inebriated elk was freed, it lay for a while on the ground, seemingly unconscious.
sentences.chinese: 当“醉鬼”获救后，它在地上躺了一会，昏迷不醒。

sentences.english: They find Jamey on the ground, bleeding from her left wrist.
sentences.chinese: 在房间里，他们发现杰米倒在地上，左手腕大量出血。

sentences.english: The content of different form nitrogen in vegetable field is higher than wood soil.
sentences.chinese: 土壤中各种形态氮的含量菜地上壤高于林地土壤。

sentences.english: The judge placed his hands on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 法官把两手放在地上，看着对方。

definition: to throw down/to fall/to drop and break
to land/to touch the ground/also pr. [zhuo2 di4]
